messageBody:
> For example while testing session beans i want the lookup for
> EJBHome to be done only once within a testcase.. How is this possible ??

You can do the following (using TestSetup inside or outside your
TestCase, search TestSetup for more info):

public void MyTestCase {

public static Test suite() {
return new TestSetup( new TestSuite(MyTestCase.class) ) {
setUp() {
// ...
}
tearDown() {
// ...
}
};
}

public void test1() {}
// ...
}

and then add your testcase with:

TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();
suite.addTest(MyTestCase.suite());

NOTE: do NOT call suite.addTestSuite(MyTestCase.class) since the
reflection machanism doesn't extract the suite() method of a class, but
the independant testXYZ methods.
